TopicTitle: Please use the touchpad on PS4

Articles.Content: Hi, the combo of joystick and movement to control the game on PS4 is not great. I made some adjustment but it's really not easy to use the small icons on screen. Why not use the nice touchpad on PS4 controller? I'm pretty sure it could be as precise as a mouse. Thank you for your great game!
It was interesting to see how much the console versions still use the cursor.
